Description: As a Data Engineer, I want to preprocess incoming documents using OpenCV or Azure Vision for de-skew, denoise, and binarization so that downstream extractors achieve higher OCR recall and fewer bounding-box errors.
Acceptance Criteria:
- 90% of incoming PDFs/images are normalized before extraction.
- Extraction confidence improves ≥5% compared to raw inputs.

Description: As a Developer, I want to persist layout fingerprints in a registry (Cosmos DB or PostgreSQL + pgvector) so that known layouts can be detected quickly and reused.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Registry supports K-NN similarity lookup.
- Lookup latency ≤2s.
- Thresholds 0.78/0.88 configurable.

Description: As a QA Engineer, I want an arbitration layer combining Textract, DI, and AOAI outputs with schema checks so that malformed JSON never reaches publishing.
Acceptance Criteria:
Arbitration weights configurable.
Schema validation blocks any non-conforming payload.

Description: As a Product Manager, I want visibility into field-level accuracy, HITL rate, and time-to-publish so that we can track progress and ROI.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Dashboard shows accuracy, HITL%, publish latency, schema failures.
- Refresh latency ≤1h.

Description: As a Data Scientist, I want thresholds and model weights externalized in JSON policy files so that tuning requires configuration, not code.
Acceptance Criteria:
Thresholds/weights reload without redeploy.
Policy audit trail maintained.

Description: As a Reviewer, I want a simple web UI showing original, candidate, and diffs so that I can approve or correct extractions quickly.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Reviewer can view/edit/approve within <30s per case.
- All actions logged to audit table.

Description: As an MLOps Engineer, I want corrected samples automatically promoted to the layout registry after ≥3 HITL approvals so that the system learns continuously.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Promotion threshold configurable (default 3).
- New layout visible in registry ≤24h.

Description: As a Developer, I want DI-General configured for unknown layouts so that extraction remains consistent without custom training.
Acceptance Criteria:
Confidence calibration merges DI-General + AOAI results.
Unknown layouts processed without failure.

Description: As a Data Validator, I want RxNorm and MedDRA lookups integrated so that medical entities are verified before submission.
Acceptance Criteria:
Drug/dose fields validated against RxNorm.
Invalid entries logged with reason.

Description: As a Platform Engineer, I want to cluster and auto-merge similar layouts (≥0.95 cosine sim) so that registry growth stays under control.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Nightly merge job executed.
- Cluster entropy Δ<0.05 per week.

Description: As a Data Scientist, I want to train DI-Custom models for top 10 layouts so that we achieve >90% accuracy on major volume.
Acceptance Criteria:
- 10 DI-Custom models deployed.
- Confidence uplift ≥15% vs generic.

Description: As a DevOps Engineer, I want Known layouts routed to DI-Custom first so that ensemble always prefers the best model.
Acceptance Criteria:
Policy file updated.
Arbitration confirms DI-Custom priority.

Description: As a Solution Architect, I want AOAI fine-tuning profiles per client so that premium customers get higher accuracy without affecting global models.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Profiles selectable per client ID.
- Validation accuracy +10% vs baseline.

Description: As a Reviewer, I want a Promote-to-Custom button in HITL so that corrected layouts convert to DI-Custom training sets immediately.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Button triggers Azure pipeline for DI-Custom project.
- Status visible in registry within 24h.

Description: As a DevOps Lead, I want SLAs, alerts, and retention policies defined so that the system is production-ready and auditable.
Acceptance Criteria:
- SLAs documented (uptime 99.5%, HITL SLO<4h).
- Alert rules active in App Insights.
